content:
Iâ€™ve been a long time Changelog listener. Just wanted to add that I think the new ShipIt is straight awesome. Specifically, I think the voice that Autumn brings to the table teaches me so many things, and I appreciate the opportunity to just listen. Please keep it going.

Justin rules, too; just want to highlight how much Autumn brings to the table for me.
I was coming to the chat tonight to post basically this same thing. I genuinely love the joy and vibes of the show, beyond the great technical content. I'm so glad Autumn and Justin are helming it!

The show is great overall. The hosts and guests cover interesting content and keep the human aspect in the conversation which I like. Sometimes they get off topic a bit too much and it leaves me wanting more of the topic but that can happen anywhere so it's not so much a problem as it is just a note. I wouldn't change the hosts at all but sometimes the audio levels aren't equal and it's jarring since some audio (e.g., Autumn's laughter) comes in quite higher than everyone else's audio. I love the laugh though it makes listening fun!
lol I thought from the title of this thread it was about "coming up with rules for a shipping tool" :joy:
I have instantly subscribed :+1:
oh no was it one of the podcasts that was culled? :sob:
It was. However Justin and Autumn started a spiritual successor called Fork Around and Find Out: https://www.fafo.fm/
As it turns out so was Go Time. However Matt (above in the thread) is also part of another spiritual successor called Fallthrough: https://fallthrough.transistor.fm/
thanks a million! and what a fantastic name for a podcast :joy:
I'll probably not join in on the fallthrough one since I'm not Goish at all

Chris Manson said:

I'll probably not join in on the fallthrough one since I'm not Goish at all

We've expanded beyond Go. Limiting a podcast to Go only content is a nightmare for content.
